SkillLevelDetail.EffectDescription: Melee attack inflicting 255% of basic damage to surrounding enemies HP -10%

Melee attack inflicting 265% of basic damage to surrounding enemies HP -10%
Enables you to quickly close the distance to an enemy using long-ranged attacks.\nAttacks the enemy with 310% Attack Strength while receiving 60% less damage.
A wide area attack from beyond the grave. Spirits haunt those struck. Ctrl-Click for accurate targeting.
Warp to an enemy's position and perform a haunting cleave in all directions. Ctrl-Click for accurate targeting.
You can use Dual Cylinders effectively.
